mapper.insert: insert into t_spgys (spgysId, spgysName, spgysMark, spgysMark1, spgysMark2, spgysPhone, spgysDizhi, spgysDate, spgysDate1, spgysType, spgysType1) values (#{spgysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spgysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spgysDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spgysType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spgysType1,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_spgys set spgysName = #{spgysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spgysMark = #{spgysMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spgysMark1 = #{spgysMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spgysMark2 = #{spgysMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spgysPhone = #{spgysPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spgysDizhi = #{spgysDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spgysDate = #{spgysDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, spgysDate1 = #{spgysDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, spgysType = #{spgysType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spgysType1 = #{spgysType1,jdbcType=INTEGER} where spgysId = #{spgysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select spgysId, spgysName, spgysMark, spgysMark1, spgysMark2, spgysPhone, spgysDizhi, spgysDate, spgysDate1, spgysType, spgysType1 from t_spgys where spgysId = #{spgysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
